entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
